docs.title: Changelog
docs.text:
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on Keep a Changelog, and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • world objective - triggers when the player enters a specific world.

docs.title: World enter: world
docs.text:
This Objective is completed by entering a world. If the player is already in that world, he needs to reenter it.

Parameter Syntax Default Value Explanation World World Name The name of the world the player needs to enter. Example
objectives:
  Farmworld: "world Farmworld events:SendRules"
Variable Properties Name Example Output Explanation name Farmworld Shows the name of the world that should be entered.
